history.action: üîç T-4 QA HEALTH REPORT (C472) ‚Äî Full coverage audit and test verification. Core 87.7% coverage (exceeds 80% target), CLI lib 87.36%. Tests 1,220 ‚úÖ confirmed, no regression since T-5 (C462). E2E test coverage limitation documented (expected). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Running full coverage audit at T-4 catches any drift before final Go/No-Go. Module-level analysis reveals coverage debt for Sprint 2 prioritization. Lesson: E2E tests provide functional verification but don't contribute to coverage metrics ‚Äî document this to avoid confusion when reviewing numbers.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è T-4 CODE QUALITY SWEEP (C473) ‚Äî Fixed all 16 lint warnings across CLI and core packages. Eliminated non-null assertions and explicit any types with type-safe patterns. Pre-launch housekeeping.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Using TypeScript flow analysis to guide safe null checks instead of assertions. Lesson: Small maintenance cycles between features keep code quality high without blocking progress.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è T-3 RELEASE READINESS (C474) ‚Äî Verified CI stability: 15 consecutive green runs (+5 since T-5 C464). Lint 0 warnings confirmed post-C473 cleanup.
